CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1953, p. 2, reads: "Get-Together - Dr. Aaron Brown, president of Albany State College, Albany, Ga., and his wife were recent visitors in Pittsburgh, Pa., while en route to Cleveland, Ohio, to attend the Alpha and AKA Conventions.  In Pittsburgh they were guests of Dr. Brown's sister, Mrs. Edward Walton, and her family.  Left to right: Dr. Brown, Barbara Walton, Edward Walton, Mrs. Brown, Mrs. Walton and Joan Walton. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. Aaron Brown, Barbara Walton, Edward Walton, Mrs. Brown, and Joan Walton gathered around Christmas tree in Walton home
